 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפַק‎</span>] **verb Hithpa\`el** ==support oneself, lean== (Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***reclinare, accumbere*** ad mensam; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be gentle, bind camel's arm to prevent going quickly***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְפַּק‎</span>, Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַרְפְּקָא‎</span>, ***elbow***); — ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְרַפֶּקֶת‎</span> [[Song.8.5|Song 8:5]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רפשׂ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רפס‎</span>. above
